C209C0E98CAC4A9688865B5118560D00.description:

model releases, image appropriateness, and cultural sensitivity).

E7087610781B45299CE04A1498D2230A.description:
Practice correct usage of copyright laws (i.e. the right to reproduce, manipulate, distribute,
plagiarize or exhibit another photographerâs work outside of fair use provisions).

changed).

31864B5D289A4EE18DC0E7879664F578.description:
Students will be able to understand and practice copyright laws, ethics and legal issues
dealing with photography as identified in United States Code Title 17 Chapter 1 Section 101.

D3BF80519EE34B1683B86721A3772701.description: Demonstrate Leading Lines as an element of composition.

7DAEBA4B33874A6F877661B16ED15E2D.description: Demonstrate an understanding of compression in digital file sizes as they pertain to image capture (i.e. extra fine, fine, basic, and normal).
